introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Gymbros. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. When you use our mobile application, you trust us with your personal information. We take this privacy very seriously.

data_collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
data_collection.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the App, such as name, email address, gender, birthday, and profile picture. We also collect health-related data necessary for the app's functionality, including height, weight, fitness goals, and workout history.

data_usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
data_usage.content:
We use the information we collect or receive to: 
- Facilitate account creation and logon process.
- Calculate body metrics (BMI, BMR) and track your fitness progress.
- Manage your class bookings and memberships.
- Send you administrative information.

data_sharing.title: 4. Will Your Information be Shared?
data_sharing.content: We strictly do not sell your personal data. We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services (e.g., payment processing), to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We represent that we have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, please also remember that the internet itself is not 100% secure.

user_rights.title: 6. Your Privacy Rights
user_rights.content: You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time. If you wish to delete your account and all associated data, you can do so from the Settings menu or by contacting support.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may email us at support@gymbros.com.
